name: Red Record Shopper *Limited Edition*
description:
We would like to announce our collaboration with Pittsburgh artist Mike Budai! Mike is an amazing and prolific silk-screen artist. He designs and prints  hundreds of band posters and t-shirts, and now bags! When Ray-Min decided to bring back our original recorded shopper tote (a 15″ by 15″ tote that holds vinyl perfectly) we thought about collaborating with a Pittsburgh artist add a design to the fabric. Mike was the first artist we thought of…his love for music and fantastic designs would be perfect for a record toting bag! The Ray-Min/Budai Record shoppers are a limited edition….only 50 will be made and they will be exclusively sold in our Ray-Min Online shop!

There are 10 colors total, 5 of each. They’re a fantastic tote, even if you’re not going to buy any records! 

Size: 
15" wide by 15" high
1" deep (front to back)

Materials:
Silk-screened cotton canvas
